title: Ryland Engelhart on Why a Vegan Started a Regenerative Farm with Animals
itunes:title: Ryland Engelhart on Why a Vegan Started a Regenerative Farm with Animals
itunes:subtitle: A conversation with the co-founder of Cafe Gratitude
description:
My guest on today's episode of The Doctor's Farmacy is a food icon. Not only is he the co-founder of the influential restaurant Cafe Gratitude, he's also an author, filmmaker, activist and world leader in the rebuilding our soils to restore human and planetary health. We sat down to discuss gratitude and gratefulness, his background in the food industry, and his nonprofit Kiss the Ground. I hope you'll tune in. 

Don't forget to leave a review and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

For more great content, find me everywhere:

facebook.com/drmarkhyman

youtube.com/drhyman

instagram.com/markhymanmd


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
